dataSource.title: Data Source

params.title: Simulation Parameters
params.budgetExceeded: Budget exceeded. Reduce trades to {maxTrades} or simulations to {maxSimulations}.

metrics.kellyDescription: Helps you decide how much to risk per trade based on your win rate and reward/risk ratio.

analysis.title: Trading Strategy Analysis
analysis.mostLikelyOutcome: This is your most likely outcome
analysis.simulationsProfitable: {percent}% of all simulations were profitable, indicating {quality}.
analysis.profitQualityRisky: a risky strategy that needs improvement
analysis.reliableStrategy: A reliable strategy should be profitable in at least 70% of simulations.
analysis.commissionCostsGood: Commission costs are well-managed relative to profits.
analysis.commissionCostsModerate: Commission costs are moderate relative to profits.
analysis.commissionCostsHigh: Commission costs are high relative to profits.
analysis.bestStrategyTip: The best strategy is one you can execute consistently with confidence.

checklist.title: Daily Checklist
checklist.noItems: No checklist items yet. Click Manage to create one.

targets.title: Daily Targets
targets.profitTargetHelp: Stop trading when you reach this profit
targets.lossLimitHelp: Stop trading if you hit this loss amount
targets.maxTradesHelp: Maximum number of trades per day
targets.maxConsecutiveLossesHelp: Stop after this many losses in a row
targets.accountBalanceHelp: Today's account balance for position sizing

notes.placeholder: Write your thoughts, market outlook, focus goals...
notes.postMarketPlaceholder: How did the day go? What did you learn?

calculator.manualContractsHelp: Override suggested quantity (leave empty for auto)
calculator.noStrategiesWithTarget: No strategies with R target configured

validation.stopAboveEntry: Stop must be below entry for long trades
validation.stopBelowEntry: Stop must be above entry for short trades
validation.targetBelowEntry: Target must be above entry for long trades
validation.targetAboveEntry: Target must be below entry for short trades

plan.title: Monthly Plan
plan.noPlan: No plan configured for this month
plan.noPlanPrompt: Create a monthly plan to set your risk parameters
plan.noPreviousPlan: No previous plan to copy from
plan.newMonthBanner: New month! Create your plan for {month} {year}
plan.rolloverSuggestion: Suggested balance based on last month: {balance}

form.accountBalanceHelp: Your current account balance for this month
form.riskPerTradeHelp: Percentage of balance to risk on each trade
form.dailyLossHelp: Maximum daily loss as percentage of balance
form.monthlyLossHelp: Maximum monthly loss as percentage of balance
form.maxDailyTradesHelp: Override auto-calculated max trades per day
form.maxConsecutiveLossesHelp: Stop after this many losses in a row
form.riskReductionFactorHelp: Multiplier per consecutive loss (e.g. 0.50 = halve risk)
form.winRiskIncreaseDesc: Add % of profit to next trade's risk
form.winRiskCapDesc: Cap risk at % of first win's profit (capital protection)
form.profitReinvestmentHelpIncrease: % of last win's profit to add to next trade's risk
form.profitReinvestmentHelpCap: Cap subsequent trades' risk at this % of first win's profit
form.notesPlaceholder: Optional notes about your plan for this month...

validation.dailyExceedsMonthly: Daily loss limit should not exceed monthly loss limit

trade.autoCalculatedRisk: Auto-calculated from entry, stop loss, and position size
trade.autoCalculatedR: Auto-calculated from take profit / stop loss ratio
trade.preTradeHint: Why did I take this trade? What was my thesis?
trade.postTradeHint: How did I feel during the trade? What happened?
trade.lessonHint: What can I learn from this trade?
trade.createTagsHint: Create tags in the Analytics section
trade.contractsExecutedDesc: Total contract executions including entry, exit, and any scaling.
trade.contractsExecutedDefault: Default: Position Size x 2 (1 entry + 1 exit per contract)
trade.contractsExecutedScaling: Increase if you scaled in/out during the trade.

validation.stopLossMustBeBelowEntry: Stop loss must be below entry price for long trades
validation.stopLossMustBeAboveEntry: Stop loss must be above entry price for short trades
validation.takeProfitMustBeAboveEntry: Take profit must be above entry price for long trades
validation.takeProfitMustBeBelowEntry: Take profit must be below entry price for short trades

scaled.noExits: No exits yet - position is open
scaled.needSimple: Need a simple single entry/exit trade?
scaled.addEntryError: Please add at least one entry execution

dayDetail.clickHint: Click on a trade row to view full details
dayDetail.noData: No data available for this day

journal.title: Trade Journal
journal.tryDifferentPeriod: Try selecting a different time period

csv.requiredColumns: Your CSV should include these required columns:
csv.optionalColumns: Optional columns: exit_date, exit_price, stop_loss, take_profit, pnl, timeframe, notes, followed_plan

replayAlert.title: Replay Trades Detected
replayAlert.description: {count} trades have [R] prefix, indicating they were recorded in replay mode. This is not a replay account.
replayAlert.allReplay: All trades are from replay. Nothing to import.

ocr.title: Import from Screenshot
ocr.readyToImport: Ready to import trade with {count} executions
ocr.lowConfidence: Low confidence detection. Please review carefully.
ocr.imageQualityTip: For best results, use high-resolution screenshots with clear text

requirements.title: Screenshot Requirements
requirements.description: For successful import, your ProfitChart screenshot MUST show:

settingsItems.headers: Column headers must be visible (scroll to top)
settingsItems.expand: Expand all rows if trade is collapsed
settingsItems.contrast: Use high contrast/zoom for better OCR accuracy

requirements.tip: Tip: In ProfitChart, right-click the table header to access "Colunas Visíveis" and enable required columns

columnDetection.title: Column Detection
columnDetection.missingRequired: Missing required columns. Please ensure they are visible in your screenshot.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Analyze your performance and identify patterns

tableTooltips.pnl: Net Profit & Loss (total gains minus losses)
tableTooltips.winRate: Percentage of winning trades (wins ÷ total trades)
tableTooltips.avgR: Average R-multiple per trade (actual return ÷ planned risk)
tableTooltips.pf: Profit Factor (sum of wins ÷ sum of losses)

time.title: Time Analysis
time.bestSlotPlaceholder: Keep trading to find your best window
time.worstSlotPlaceholder: Keep trading to identify risk areas
time.heatmapSubtitle: Identify your most and least profitable trading windows

session.title: Trading Session Performance
session.bestSessionAction: Prioritize your best setups in this window
session.worstSessionAction: Review your approach or reduce size here
session.bestSessionPlaceholder: Keep trading to find your best session
session.worstSessionPlaceholder: Keep trading to identify risk sessions
session.assetDescription: How each asset performs across trading sessions

variableComparison.title: Performance by Variable
variableComparison.noData: No data available for the selected filters

tagCloud.title: Tag Analysis
tagCloud.noTags: No tags found. Add tags to your trades to see analysis here.

expectedValue.title: Expected Value
expectedValue.noData: Not enough trade data to calculate expected value
expectedValue.winRateDesc: Percentage of trades that were profitable
expectedValue.projectionDesc: Expected total P&L if you take 100 trades with the same edge
expectedValue.perTradeOverLongRun: per trade over the long run
expectedValue.systemHasEdge: Your trading system has a {edge}. On average, you can expect to make {amount} per trade over the long run.
expectedValue.systemHasPositiveEdge: Your trading system has a <positive>positive edge</positive>. On average, you can expect to make <amount></amount> per trade over the long run.
expectedValue.systemHasNegativeEdge: Your trading system currently has a <negative>negative edge</negative>. On average, you can expect to lose <amount></amount> per trade over the long run.

rDistribution.title: R-Multiple Distribution
rDistribution.noData: No R-multiple data available. Add planned risk to your trades to see distribution.
rDistribution.totalTradesDesc: Number of trades with R-multiple data (requires stop loss)
rDistribution.positiveRDesc: Trades that made more than planned risk (R > 0)
rDistribution.mostCommonDesc: The R-multiple range with the highest frequency
rDistribution.achievedPositiveR: {percent}% of your trades achieved positive R. Your most common outcome is {range} with {count} trades.
rDistribution.achievedNegativeR: {percent}% of your trades resulted in negative R. Focus on cutting losers earlier or improving entry timing.

playbook.title: Strategy Playbook
playbook.description: Manage your strategies and track compliance

compliance.title: Playbook Compliance
compliance.trackAdherence: Track your plan adherence when logging trades

weekly.title: Weekly Report

monthly.title: Monthly Report

profile.name: Name
profile.passwordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure
profile.showAllAccountsDescription: Display combined data from all your trading accounts instead of just the selected account

account.replayStartDateHelp: The date where your replay session begins

account.riskManagementDesc: Configure risk rules and loss limits
account.maxMonthlyLossHelp: Stop trading for the month if losses exceed this amount
account.allowSecondOpAfterLossHelp: Whether to allow a second trade after a losing trade

account.riskReductionFactorHelp: Multiply risk by this factor after each consecutive loss (e.g., 0.50 = halve risk)

assets.tickValueHint: Value per tick (tick size x point value). E.g. WINFUT: 5 x R$0.20 = R$1.00

timeframes.name: Name

tags.addTagDescription: Create a new tag for categorizing trades
tags.name: Name
tags.noTags: No tags yet. Create your first tag to start categorizing trades.

tags.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This will remove the tag from all trades.

general.title: General Settings
general.accountBalanceDesc: Initial trading capital (used for equity curve)
general.recalculateRDescription: Updates all trades that have stop loss data to calculate planned risk and realized R-multiple
general.recalculatePnLDescription: Recalculates profit and loss for all closed trades using asset tick configuration. Useful after fixing asset settings or importing trades with incorrect P&L.
general.dataExportDesc: Export your trade data for backup or analysis
general.exportComingSoon: Export functionality coming in a future update

monthly.title: Monthly Results
monthly.description: Monthly performance with prop trading calculations
monthly.noData: No trades recorded for this month

comparison.title: Month Comparison
comparison.noPreviousData: No data from previous month for comparison

validation.exitAfterEntry: Exit date must be after entry

tooltips.winRate: Percentage of winning trades out of total
tooltips.profitFactor: Sum of wins divided by sum of losses
tooltips.rMultiple: Result in terms of initial risk (P&L / Risk)
tooltips.mfe: Maximum Favorable Excursion - highest potential profit during trade
tooltips.mae: Maximum Adverse Excursion - highest potential loss during trade
tooltips.expectedValue: Average expected return per trade based on win rate and averages

execution.title: Executions
execution.addDescription: Add a new entry or exit execution to this trade
